Playground.Generators
Class Generator

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      Playground.Generators.Generator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AgentGenerator, ResourceGenerator
public abstract class Generator
extends java.lang.Thread

A Daemon Thread that Generate threads. Useful to be abstract for other kind of generators. As in Each Generator, daemon property is been set. In case of playground's Termination, Generators are also automated killed.

Author:
Pappas Evangelos - papas.evagelos@gmail.com - BagosGiAr
